title: A new Mertens decomposition of $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-submartingale systems. Application to BSDEs with weak constraints at stopping times. (arXiv:1708.05957v2 [math.OC] UPDATED)
abstract: We first introduce the concept of $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-submartingale systems, where the nonlinear operator $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$ corresponds to the first component of the solution of a reflected BSDE with generator $g$ and lower obstacle $\xi$. We first show that, in the case of a left-limited right-continuous obstacle, any $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-submartingale system can be aggregated by a process which is right-lower semicontinuous. We then prove a \textit{Mertens decomposition}, by using an original approach which does not make use of the standard penalization technique. These results are in particular useful for the treatment of control/stopping game problems and, to the best of our knowledge, they are completely new in the literature. As an application, we introduce a new class of \textit{Backward Stochastic Differential Equations (in short BSDEs) with weak constraints at stopping times}, which are related to the partial hedging of American options. translated_title: $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-次亚麻系统的新的Mertens分解，及其在弱停时条件下的BSDE应用
translated_abstract: 首先引入了$\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-次亚麻系统的概念，其中非线性算子$\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$对应于具有$g$生成函数和下面界$\xi$ 的反射BSDE解的第一部分。然后我们首先证明了，在左有限右连续障碍物的情况下，任何$\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-次亚麻系统都可以通过一个右下半连续的过程聚合。接着，我们证明了一种“Mertens分解”的方法，该方法不使用标准的罚款技术。这些结果对于处理控制/停止博弈问题特别有用，并且据我们所知，它们在文献中是全新的。作为一个应用，我们引入了一类新的“弱停时条件下反向随机微分方程（简称BSDE）”，与美式期权的部分对冲相关。我们研究了这种BSDE的良态性。
tldr: 介绍了$\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-次亚麻系统和Mertens分解的概念，应用于处理控制/停止博弈问题并提出了一类新的弱停时条件下的BSDE。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces the concept of $\mathscr{Y}^{g,\xi}$-submartingale systems and a Mertens decomposition method, which are useful for solving control/stopping game problems. It also proposes a new class of Backward Stochastic Differential Equations (BSDEs) with weak constraints at stopping times, related to partial hedging of American options.
